channel.title: The Banned Thought添加了社會主義政治經濟學的頁面
channel.description: 2022年9月29日——最近，在MLM理论部分为社会主义和共产主义政治经济学的作品增加了新的一页。我们已经发布了许多从苏联社会主义时期到中国毛泽东主义时期的重要作品，尽管我们希望找到更多。为了便于比较，我们还增加了一些作品，这些作品声称是关于苏联国家资本主义时期和其他修正主义来源的社会主义政治经济的。 2022 September 29 — Recently added a new page for works on the political economy of socialism and communism in the MLM-Theory section. We already have posted many of the important works we have access to so far from the socialist period in the Soviet Union and from the Maoist (socialist) period in China, though we hope to locate more. And for comparison purposes we are also adding some works which claim to be about the political economy of socialism from the state-capitalist period of the Soviet Union and from other revisionist sources. [**MLM-Theory, Political Economy of Socialism page**](https://www.bannedthought.net/MLM-Theory/PoliticalEconomyOfSocialism/index.htm) https://www.bannedthought.net/MLM-Theory/PoliticalEconomyOfSocialism/index.htm

item.title: The Banned Thought添加了社會主義政治經濟學的頁面
item.dc:creator: Xuan_JunHe
item.description:
2022年9月29日——最近，在MLM理论部分为社会主义和共产主义政治经济学的作品增加了新的一页。我们已经发布了许多从苏联社会主义时期到中国毛泽东主义时期的重要作品，尽管我们希望找到更多。为了便于比较，我们还增加了一些作品，这些作品声称是关于苏联国家资本主义时期和其他修正主义来源的社会主义政治经济的。
2022 September 29 — Recently added a new page for works on the political economy of socialism and communism in the MLM-Theory section. We already have posted many of the important works we have access to so far from the socialist period in the Soviet Union and from the Maoist (socialist) period in China, though we hope to locate more. And for comparison purposes we are also adding some works which claim to be about the political economy of socialism from the state-capitalist period of the Soviet Union and from other revisionist sources.
MLM-Theory, Political Economy of Socialism page
https://www.bannedthought.net/MLM-Theory/PoliticalEconomyOfSocialism/index.htm

阅读完整话题
item.source: The Banned Thought添加了社會主義政治經濟學的頁面
